name: Zakaat Calculator
author: Haseeb Ahmad Ayazi

sections.description:
A beautiful Interactive Plugin which can be used to add Zakaat Calculator in your websites sidebar.It contains all required fields for calculating annual zakaat Bank Saving Use lowest amount held for 1 year

Gold & Silver Monetary value

Money owed to you Deposits, loans you made

Resale value of shares, stocks, bonds, etc.

and calculate it to 2.5%

Developed Under Techooid.com.
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto widgets and Drag the widget to required space.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

How to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto widgets and Drag the widget to required space.

Is it According to Islamic Terms?

This Plugin will simply calculate the 2.5% of your wealth which is according to Islam.

Is it Save to use?

We Update it according to latest WordPress releases and completely save to use.
